task.title: Importing Data into TaskFlow ProSync
task.shortdesc: Here are step-by-step instructions for importing data into the TaskFlow ProSync application for efficient data management.

context.p: To import data into the TaskFlow ProSync application:

step.cmd: Choose the import option from the toolbar.
Select the data file to import and specify import settings.
Review the preview and map fields if necessary.
Initiate the import process and monitor the progress.
Verify the imported data in the respective module.
